sentences.en: A watercourse that feeds water into a mill, water wheel, or turbine.
sentences.cn: 一种把水从磨房或水轮或涡轮放出的水渠.

sentences.en: chemicals that pollute the local watercourse
sentences.cn: 污染当地河道的化学品

sentences.en: Control of the watercourse, fittings wholesale, retail.
sentences.cn: 水道管件、洁具批发 、 零售.

sentences.en: Improvements were carried out to a watercourse to enable cattle to range across the common.
sentences.cn: 水道得到了改进,以便家畜可以在整个区域走动.

sentences.en: The waste repository was usually the nearest watercourse.
sentences.cn: 废物容纳地点一般是离城市最近的水域.

sentences.en: This is now mainly used in textile machinery components and watercourse product components.
sentences.cn: 目前主要使用于纺织机械零部件及水道零部件中.

sentences.en: This river has a zigzagging watercourse and many branches.
sentences.cn: 这条河的河道曲折,汊流众多.

sentences.en: This species of fish successfully transferred to that river through a watercourse.
sentences.cn: 这种鱼成功地通过一条水道到了那条河流。

trans.tran_en: a place where water flows, for example a river or canal
